1418260.name: Rugby League Team Manager 3 DLC "Representative & International Teams & Competitions"
1418260.description:
Representative & International Teams & Competitions

This DLC features a full upgrade for Rugby League Team Manager 3. This update includes 3 new International / Representative Competitions, 4 new Representative Teams and 16 new International Teams.

3 New International / Representative Competitions

New South Wales vs Queensland
War of the Roses
Nations Cup

4 New Representative Teams

New South Wales
Queensland
Lancashire
Yorkshire

16 New International Teams


Featuring nations around the globe.



If you purchase the Int / Rep Competitions and Teams DLC update, but still wish to play with your old saved games,
please right click the game in the library and select Properties, then the DLC tab, then untick the Installed checkbox. To switch back to play
with Rugby League Team Manager 3 with the DLC, then please just tick the Installed checkbox.

Please note your saved games created without the DLC will not work with the DLC, and any saved games created whilst playing
with the DLC will not work or show up with the non-updated game

Also note:-
When you right click the game in the library, select Properties, then tick or untick the Installed check box in the DLC tab, it activates a download update.
So each time you tick or untick the Installed checkbox, you have to wait for the update to download.
1418260.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
